Parallels.ab: daɱaiiā̊ vaŋhuiiā̊ āfritōiš daɱaheca narš aṣ̌aōnō uγraheca taxmahe dāmōiš upamanahe yazatahe = VrS1.15, VrS25.17, VrS27.31, VrS77.16, VrS90.15; ~ Y7.30, VrS82.36 daɱam vaŋᵛhīm āfritīm yazamaide uγrəm taxməm dāmōiš upamanəm yazatəm yazamaide ... frasasti daɱaiiā̊ vaŋhuiiā̊ āfritōiš; ~ Y8.2 daɱaiiā̊ vaŋhuiiā̊ āfritōiš uγrāi dāmōiš upamanāi
daɱaiiā̊ vaŋhuiiā̊ āfritōiš daɱaheca narš aṣ̌aōnō ~ Y61.1, Y72.1 daɱaheca narš aṣ̌aōnō daɱąmca vaŋᵛhīm āfritīm.
daɱaiiā̊ vaŋhuiiā̊ āfritōiš ... uγraheca taxmahe dāmōiš upamanahe yazatahe ~ A1.1, A1.13 (Šn).

uγraheca taxmahe dāmōiš upamanahe yazatahe ~ Yt10.9, Yt12.4, Yt12.6 haϑra dāmōiš upamanō; ~ Yt10.66 uγrasca dāmōiš upamanō; ~ Yt10.68 yat̰ dim dāmōiš upamanō; ~ Yt10.127 taxmō dāmōiš upamanō; ~ Yt13.47 uγraca dāmōiš upamana; ~ Yt13.48 uγraca dāmōiš upamanō.
taxmahe dāmōiš upamanahe yazatahe ~ Y71.24, VrS18.5, VrS30.11, VrS36.5, VrS41.6, VrS51.8, VrS57.8, VrS62.8, VrS64.9, VrS65.82, VrS69.8, VrS71.8, VrS87.12, VrS93.11taxməm dāmōiš upamanəm yazatəm
